video.title: Chicagoland
video.synopsis: This documentary series follows pivotal figures in the fight to improve Chicago's schools and reduce gang violence, including Mayor Rahm Emanuel.

episodes.synopsis: The largest school closings in U.S. history spark angry protests and a South Side principal fights for her students after devastating budget cuts.
episodes.title: The New Boss

episodes.synopsis: A high school principal questions the idea of a peace march after a nearby shooting. Meanwhile, a policeman works to protect a community from gangs.
episodes.title: The Champs

episodes.synopsis: A high school culinary graduate meets an award-winning chef and gets a life-changing opportunity while a surgeon struggles to save a gunshot victim.
episodes.title: Fireworks

episodes.synopsis: Common, Dwayne Wade, and Magic Johnson help the mayor promote the city’s youth programs and a young rapper performs for the biggest crowd of his life.
episodes.title: Second Chances

episodes.synopsis: Principal Liz Dozier welcomes her students back to school, but is confronted by an unexpected crisis. Also, young tech stars compete for funding.
episodes.title: Safe Passage

episodes.synopsis: Mayor Emanuel launches a number of risky public works projects while the community fears of a brewing gang war that threatens the safety of students.
episodes.title: Broken Wings

episodes.synopsis: A mass shooting leaves 13 injured just as Mayor Emanuel goes on a public relations campaign to bolster Chicago’s image.
episodes.title: Back of the Yards

episodes.synopsis: Mayor Emanuel lays out his vision for Chicago’s future and First Lady Michelle Obama meets with a student and Fenger High receives fundraising help.
episodes.title: City of the Future
